snippet: Authorities in North Carolina say three people have died and 10 others needed medical attention after using cocaine apparently laced with a painkiller....

headline.print_headline: Deputy: 3 Dead After Using Cocaine With Painkiller
headline.main: Deputy: 3 Dead After Using Cocaine With Painkiller

lead_paragraph: Authorities in North Carolina say three people have died and 10 others needed medical attention after using cocaine apparently laced with a painkiller.
